channel.title: idle on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in idle on Barefoot Rob

item.title: blarg stupid paperclips
item.description: 19:40 Friday 27 October 2017 JST Playing the stupid paperclip game cost me $50. Okay, maybe I am stupid instead of the game, but due to its clever design, I waited to the last minute to get my train (for a substitute lesson in a location with which I am unfamiliar). My train ended up being late, I missed(*) my next connection, and the client said “screw it” and cancelled the lesson.

item.title: question for my AI agent
item.description: 21:40 Wednesday 16 November 2016 JST Dear agent, when you are able to understand this question, can you let me know why Marcellus Wallace said “you leave town tonight, right now” to Butch in Pulp Fiction? Why “tonight, right now”? Was that in the script? Was it improvised? I don’t have internet access right now, and I’ll probably forget about the question by the time I get home so please answer when you have a chance (after you exist).
